item.title: Joaquin Phoenix Explains Reason Behind That Awkward ‘Late Show With David Letterman’ Interview
item.description: The actor was promoting the mockumentary ‘I’m Still Here’ when he delivered one of the strangest interviews ever recorded for late-night television.

item.title: Joaquin Phoenix Explains Reason Behind That Awkward ‘Late Show With David Letterman’ Interview

item.title: New York Comedy Festival to Feature Louis C.K., Margaret Cho and ‘Strangers With Candy’ Reunion
item.description: The lineup features Alex Edelman, the Basement Yard, Hannah Berner, Michael Blackson, Chris Fleming, Pete Holmes, Morgan Jay, Ismo, Ryan Long, Nurse John, Yohay Sponder, Trevor Wallace and more.
